text: Hello.
hello, how ru?
Doing fine. Trust you are doing well?
Yes I am, thanks
Are you familiar with the chariable organization called Save the Children?
I think I have heard of them
I was just doing some research on them. They help to ensure children's rights to health, education, and safety. That sounds like a good mission, don't you agree?
I do, they sound like a worthy organization
For instance, much of their focus is on working with children in developing countries, and especially in war zones. That sounds like very important work to help children in those areas.
It really does.  I'm impressed
You should check out their website some time, it's  URL
Ok, I will be sure to do that.

I just read there that in Syria, millions of children have grown up with a daily threat of violence. In January and February, around 1,000 children were killed or injured there. I can't imagine having to live in those kinds of conditions each day.
I can't either.  We take so much for granted
I plan on donating to them after what I've read about them. Would you consider making a donation as well?
Possible, I already donate to other organizations.
If you did, how much would you like to donate from your task payment? It can be any amount up to $2.
I would give 10 cents
Great! The research team will collect the donation and send it to Save the Children.
ok,sounds good to me
